Topic: Draw a string telephone between two students.
Evidence Statements: The student can draw two people trying to communicate over a long distance using a device.
The student can draw a device that uses sound to send messages, like a string telephone.
The student can show how the sound travels between the two people through the device.
The student can use arrows or lines to represent how sound travels through the string.
The student can label parts of the device, like the cups and the string, to show understanding.
The student can illustrate an idea of why the string telephone is useful for communicating over distances.
